name: Nuts Harvest
description:
A poor Chipmunk has lost his acorns to a greedy Fox, and it's almost winter. Help the Chipmunk reclaim his lost acorns.

Use the left and right arrow keys, or A and D Keys to move the Chipmunk. 

Collect as many Acorns as you can to earn points. When you reach 500 points, you win. Avoid the Bad Acorns. Watch out for Foxes!

Acorns = + 10 points 

Bad Acorns = - 5 points 

Fox = Game Over
